name: rentacar-api
description: - Customers;   - can select start and end date and see the list of available cars on selected dates. It is not allowed to choose past dates.   - can choose a car on the list and reserve that car, but can not reserve more than one car on a selected time period,   - can not reserve cars which are reserved by other customers on selected time period.   - can see the list of their reservations including past ones.   - can update reservations.   - can delete their reservations.
